amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Diesel Emission Reduction Grants by $100,000,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 114-683 to eliminate funding for Diesel Emission Reduction Grants and sends the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 250 (Roll no. 426).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 250 (Roll no. 426).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Palmer.
